title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: Iconic rangefinder camera from 1954, excellent condition with original leather case and 50mm Summicron lens.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: Rare cherry finish, all original parts, owned by a studio musician with certificate of authenticity.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Working condition with original keyboard, mouse, and software. A piece of computing history.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Classic stainless steel diving watch, recently serviced with box and papers, excellent condition.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Rare first printing from 1925 with original dust jacket, preserved in archival-quality casing.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: Original Herman Miller production from 1956, rosewood veneer and black leather, authenticated.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Signed limited edition 'Girl with Balloon' silkscreen print, numbered 382/750 with certificate.

title: 1969 Fender Stratocaster
description: Sunburst finish, maple neck, original pickups, played by several touring musicians in the 1970s.

title: Rare First-Issue Bitcoin Physical Coin
description: 2011 Casascius physical bitcoin, unpeeled with 1 BTC value, in protective case with verification.

title: NASA Apollo 11 Mission Patch
description: Original crew patch worn during training, signed by Buzz Aldrin with photo documentation.

title: Original 1985 Air Jordan 1 Sneakers
description: Unworn condition, original box, Chicago colorway, authenticated by Stadium Goods.

title: 1950s Omega Speedmaster Pre-Moon
description: Rare pre-professional model, caliber 321 movement, original bracelet and dial in exceptional condition.

title: Handwritten Lyrics by Bob Dylan
description: Original handwritten lyrics to 'Blowin' in the Wind' on hotel stationery, 1962, with authentication.

title: Signed First Edition Harry Potter Book
description: First printing of 'Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone', signed by J.K. Rowling, near-mint condition.

title: Vintage Polaroid SX-70 Land Camera
description: Original 1972 folding SLR instant camera, fully restored and functional with custom leather case.
